*** Bug 29010 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed.
The method ReferenceType#classLoader() was overridden in ArrayTypeImpl and
returned null in all cases.
The JDI spec doesn't say anything specific for ArrayImpl#classLoader, so the
more generic method ReferencTypeImpl#classLoader() has to be used. Furthermore,
a classLoader() method cannot return null in all cases, as null correspond to
the bootstrap classloader.

Removed ArrayTypeImpl#classLoader()
